idea-plugin.name: Smart Copy for CLI
idea-plugin.description:
Copy the current selection as a CLI-friendly reference.

This plugin converts the selected code range into a compact path + line range format like src/utils/test.py:37-42, or optionally followed by a formatted Markdown code block.

Features

  • Copy Path Only (Alt+Shift+C): Copies file path and line range only
  • Copy Path and Code (Ctrl+Alt+Shift+C): Copies file path, line range, and code block

Example Output

src/utils/helper.py:37-42

Perfect for referencing code in issues, pull requests, documentation, or chat tools.
